entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 5 May 2023
